          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Refraction of sound waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung der Schallwellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction des vagues saines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction de ondas sadias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione delle onde sonore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση των υγιών κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción de ondas acústicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows what happens to sound waves travelling in air with areas of different temperatures.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">travelling waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">warmer air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">waves temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, was den Schallwellen 
geschieht, die in einer Luft mit Bereichen der unterschiedlichen 
Temperaturen fortpflanzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre ce qui arrive aux vagues
saines voyageant en air avec des zones des différentes températures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o que acontece às ondas 
sadias que viajam no ar com áreas de temperaturas diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che cosa accade alle 
onde sonore che viaggiano in aria con le zone delle temperature 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τι συμβαίνει στα υγιή 
κύματα που ταξιδεύουν στον αέρα με τους τομείς των διαφορετικών 
θερμοκρασιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué sucede a las ondas
acústicas que viajan en aire con áreas de diversas temperaturas.</string>
          </description>
